functions.name: dojo_whitelist_native_token
functions.description: Whitelist a native token by adding its denomination and decimals to the factory.

denom.description: The denomination of the native token to whitelist (e.g., 'inj').

decimals.description: The number of decimals for the token (e.g., 18).

functions.name: dojo_create_liquidity_pool
functions.description: Create a liquidity pool for two tokens. Supports native and CW20 tokens.

denom1.description: The denomination or contract address of the first token.

denom2.description: The denomination or contract address of the second token.

is_cw20_asset1.description: Whether the first token is a CW20 token. Defaults to false.

is_cw20_asset2.description: Whether the second token is a CW20 token. Defaults to false.

functions.name: provide_liquidity_on_dojo
functions.description: Provide liquidity to an existing pair, supporting both CW20 and native tokens.

pair_address.description: The address of the liquidity pair contract.

token1_denom.description: The denomination or contract address of the first token.

token1_amount.description: The amount of the first token to provide.

token2_denom.description: The denomination or contract address of the second token.

token2_amount.description: The amount of the second token to provide.

is_token1_cw20.description: Whether the first token is a CW20 token. Defaults to false.

is_token2_cw20.description: Whether the second token is a CW20 token. Defaults to false.

functions.name: get_dojo_pair_info
functions.description: Fetch information about a specific DojoSwap token pair.

pair.description: The address of the DojoSwap pair contract.

functions.name: dojo_trade_assets_from_pair
functions.description: Buy an asset from a DojoSwap liquidity pair. Supports both native and CW20 tokens.

pair_address.description: The address of the liquidity pair contract.

offer_asset_address.description: The address of the asset being offered (denomination for native tokens or contract address for CW20).

amount.description: The amount of the asset to swap in whole units.

max_spread.description: Maximum allowable price slippage, expressed as a percentage (default is 2%).
